body:
“Okay Captain Marvel, we need you to track down a fugitive, she’s been missing since the battle with Thanos, and we need you to NOT fall in love with her.

Carol, five seconds later about to spark the human/alien love story of a generation:

tags: captain marvel hype for nothing but 15 mins
wtf russos stop hyping things up that arent gonna be important in your films
body:
I don’t care

I don’t care if the movie wasn’t supposed to be about Captain Marvel. I get that. I get that it was about the original six. But like Marvel literally hyped her up with the pager and the “Where’s Fury?” Scene only to have her show up for 15 minutes. Like i get they filmed Brie’s scenes in Endgame before Captain Marvel itself but they should have tried to have her in the story more. Hell we got Rocket and Antman and Nebula more and they aren’t in the original six. They should have tried to put her in more like they promised us. There are ways to put characters in scenes without overshadowing the main ones. So disappointed in Russos.

Also it annoys me that haters at first were like “Captain Marvel better not kill Thanos.” Then they got just that and are still complaining like “Oh Captain Marvel did nothing!”.

Yeah she didn’t get much screen time but Tony would have been dead in space without seeing Pepper again and having a kid so shut the fuck up. Thanks to Carol he got to live 5 years with his family. Not to mention that Carol, Nat, Rocket, Okoye, and Rhodes were the Avengers for 5 years and kept doing their jobs while the others sat down and gave up. Also if Carol hadn’t blasted through that ship all your favs might have died in the war. Seriously tired of this unnecessary hate. She didn’t get to kill Thanos so be happy and enjoy your dead Tony now. If the Russos had used her properly along with other powerful Avengers like Wanda. Tony could still be alive. Tony didn’t deserve to die. If the Russos had Carol save him again then I think it would have come full circle with “because before you didnt have me” and all that hype they gave us in advertising. And it would have given Carol more purpose as a new Avenger.

summary:
A gift for my supernerd 

ophthalmologist. He cure my eyes with so much love, ‘cause he understand how much is important to me...
caption:
A gift for my supernerd  ophthalmologist.

He cure my eyes with so much love, ‘cause he understand how much is important to me see properly (he cure everyone very well, but sometimes i have some kind of emergency, my eyes pressure is high and it’s nasty if you work at pc or paper so much). So i’ve decided to make him a gift. I know he is a nerd, and a Marvel fan, but i don’t know so much, so i choose a character that i like, Captain Marvel. <3

blog.title: The Bee's Knees!

summary: Girl.... do not even try with that “is it because he’s black?” With Rhodey and captain marvel. We all know everyone wants her to...
question: Girl.... do not even try with that “is it because he’s black?” With Rhodey and captain marvel. We all know everyone wants her to be lesbian, and we all know her ONLY woman love interests that the fans have been following ARE BOTH ALSO BLACK. Don’t even try to pin racism on those that just wanna have a lesbian character, alright? Why can’t she love a black woman instead of a black man? BFFs with Rhodey is best, not lovers if marvel really cares about lgbt representation. Fuck outta here with that
answer:
So maybe I should’ve made this clear

When I made that post about Carol and Rhodey, I was responding to this post when someone at Marvel said they were hinting at their romance and everyone’s common response was ‘the straights are at it again’

Now I questioned if it was racism with Rhodey bc no one hesitated to ship her with Thor when those two had the small interaction of him summoning Stormbreaker, her not flinching, and him saying that he “liked this one”

I fucking knowwww everyone ships Carol with Maria and Valkyrie

But I also know a lot of white fans did not hesitate to push Carol/Thor wayyyy more than Carol/Maria or Carol/Valkyrie

So I wanted to know IF BASED ON COMICS, Rhodey and Carol were to be together, why would that be a bad thing if it was hinted at?

The only valid answer I know of is how old the actors are bc that makes sense it’s a huge age gap

Why can’t Carol be bi or pan?

I’m not expecting you to answer or agree, but I asked a question on my blog and if you didn’t agree with what the hell I had to say, you could’ve approached me way more nicer than you did
